name: I Love Beauty: Hollywood Makeover
synopsis: Appropriately applied eyeshadows and emphasized eye contours. Shiny, right red lips and suitably chosen nail polish. Neatly plucked eyebrows. Shortly speaking professional make-up! Now you can learn it too. Thanks to I Love Beauty you will get to know the secrets of make-up and have lots of fun. Find out how fascinating and entertaining it is to color lips or extend eyelashes!
